org.apache.ambari.server.view

Class ViewRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.view.ViewRegistry

  • @Singleton
public class ViewRegistry
extends Object
    Registry for view and view instance definitions.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  ViewRegistry.ViewModule
      Module for stand alone view registry.

                         throws ValidationException,

                                org.apache.ambari.view.SystemException
        TODO : This should move to ViewInstanceOperationHandler Install the given view instance with its associated view.
        Parameters:
        instanceEntity - the view instance entity
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if the given instance fails the validation checks
        IllegalArgumentException - if the view associated with the given instance does not exist
        org.apache.ambari.view.SystemException - if the instance can not be installed

      • hasPermission

        public boolean hasPermission(PermissionEntity permissionEntity,
                             ResourceEntity resourceEntity,
                             String userName)
        Determine whether or not the access specified by the given permission is permitted for the given user on the view instance identified by the given resource.
        Parameters:
        permissionEntity - the permission entity
        resourceEntity - the resource entity
        userName - the user name
        Returns:
        true if the access specified by the given permission is permitted for the given user.

      • checkPermission

        public boolean checkPermission(String viewName,
                               String version,
                               String instanceName,
                               boolean readOnly)
        Determine whether or not access to the view instance resource identified by the given instance name should be allowed based on the permissions granted to the current user.
        Parameters:
        viewName - the view name
        version - the view version
        instanceName - the name of the view instance resource
        readOnly - indicate whether or not this is for a read only operation
        Returns:
        true if the access to the view instance is allowed

      • checkPermission

        public boolean checkPermission(ViewInstanceEntity instanceEntity,
                               boolean readOnly)
        Determine whether or not access to the given view instance should be allowed based on the permissions granted to the current user.
        Parameters:
        instanceEntity - the view instance entity
        readOnly - indicate whether or not this is for a read only operation
        Returns:
        true if the access to the view instance is allowed

      • checkAdmin

        public boolean checkAdmin()
        Determine whether or not the current view user has admin rights.
        Returns:
        true if the current view user is an admin

      • includeDefinition

        public boolean includeDefinition(ViewEntity definitionEntity)
        Determine whether or not the given view definition resource should be included based on the permissions granted to the current user.
        Parameters:
        definitionEntity - the view definition entity
        Returns:
        true if the view instance should be included based on the permissions of the current user

      • setViewInstanceRoleAccess

        protected void setViewInstanceRoleAccess(ViewInstanceEntity viewInstanceEntity,
                                         Collection<String> roles)
        Set access to the a particular view instance based on a set of roles.

        View access to the specified view instances will be granted to anyone directly or indirectly assigned to one of the roles in the suppled set of role names.

        Parameters:
        viewInstanceEntity - a view instance entity
        roles - the set of roles to use to for granting access

      • checkViewVersions

        protected boolean checkViewVersions(ViewEntity view,
                                    String serverVersion)
        Check the configured view max and min Ambari versions for the given view entity against the given Ambari server version.
        Parameters:
        view - the view
        serverVersion - the server version
        Returns:
        true if the given server version >= min version && <= max version for the given view
